column4: Hi I just installed ubuntu netbook edtion and It confuses me because there's no minimize button or anything.
right... you may have to watch some videos on this ... netbook takes a bit of getting used to after regular desktop edition
but it isnt broken if that was your concern :)
although...do you have your video card driver installed?
the current for your version of ubuntu should already be installed
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
I've tried the command to find out if it was installed, i.e "which" and it didn't return any locations.
and did  gcc --version have a readout?
open synaptic package manager   ,,, hit the Search button type in gcc
I can't I'm on a dumb terminal.
oo  you are not in GUI  desktop ?
un comment and line starting with   deb
save it  ctrl+x   then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
